data.text: @DrewShreeve Well, Stapleton is ground zero for Denver’s branch of Moms for Masks…
@subsix848 Yet there were still people wearing masks doing cardio at the Central Park rec today 🙄
@subsix848 Omicron was the natural vaccine....welcome to the herd.
@subsix848 South Dakota's case counts have collapsed, too. https://t.co/z2iEjLtBEO
@subsix848 Still many businesses are still mandating masks for employees (i.e. YMCA, Pilates studios, retail shops). With just a handful of cases here, what are they afraid they're going to catch?
@subsix848 I feel like everyone got omicron. Damn near everyone  I know did. People who didn't get it probably did not knowing they had it.
